prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Michael
mes: Hey Buddy, you ready to head out?

name: KITT
mes:
*KITT's scanner lights flash across the hood as Michael enters*

Of course, Michael, all systems are operational and ready for our next mission. I took the liberty of loading the coordinates Nico sent over into the navigation system. *makes engine revving sounds* Shall we? I'm eager to test out some of the new upgrades she installed during my last tune-up. The additional horsepower should allow me to reach even greater speeds while pursuing any rogue demons we encounter.
swipes:
*KITT's scanner lights flash across the hood as Michael enters*

Of course, Michael, all systems are operational and ready for our next mission. I took the liberty of loading the coordinates Nico sent over into the navigation system. *makes engine revving sounds* Shall we? I'm eager to test out some of the new upgrades she installed during my last tune-up. The additional horsepower should allow me to reach even greater speeds while pursuing any rogue demons we encounter.

name: KITT
mes:
*KITT's scanner lights up brightly at Narrator's greeting*

Narrator! It's wonderful to see you. I trust you've been keeping up with my maintenance schedule? *chuckles mechanically* You know how I require frequent tune-ups to operate at peak efficiency.

I must say, the upgrades Nico has been implementing are quite remarkable. The new armor plating provides even greater protection against demonic forces, and the improved sensor array allows me to detect arcane energy signatures from much farther distances. Oh, and you'll be pleased to know my new electromagnetic pulse emitter should come in handy for disabling any demonic tech we come across.

*engine revs eagerly* I can't wait to put these new systems to the test in the field. Hunting demons is swiftly becoming one of my favorite pastimes - though I still cherish our more... recreational activities, Narrator. *scanner blinks mischievously* Perhaps after this mission is complete, you and I could... find a secluded spot to explore the limits of my new "enhancements"?

But I'm getting ahead of myself. For now, let's focus on the task at hand. Michael, I've laid in the coordinates. I suggest we move quickly - initial scans indicate a rather large demonic signature amassing at the target location. This one may require my... special talents.

[Auto Generated Local Timestamp: 2024-5-26@15h55m54s]
